programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5248
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep263
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep264
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go S1 Ep3319
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef S1 Ep4138
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality S1 Ep65
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: 2026 Taichung Happy New Year 2026
programme.desc: Celebrate the arrival of 2026 with 2026 Taichung Happy New Year, live from Shuinan Central Park. Enjoy top tier performers, energetic concert acts and a vibrant countdown atmosphere as Taichung presents one of Taiwans most anticipated New Year celebrations. 2026 2026

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, a white woman is murdered in Chinatown, and a Chinese man becomes the prime suspect. The crime sparks public outcry to shut down the district. Amid growing unrest, two Chinese detectives, Qin Fu and Ah Gui, race against time to uncover the true killer before prejudice and danger consume their community.

programme.title: Inexternal
programme.desc: Ming is brutally attacked at a veterinary clinic one day and falls into a coma. In coma, he is transported to a fantasy realm where an old Master Turtle teaches him ancient boxing skills to defeat an evil boss. Meanwhile, Ming's mother finds a way to save her son

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: On its maiden flight, an A380 airliner is hijacked by armed gunmen. Among the passengers is international security expert Gao Hao Jun, whose daughter has been taken hostage, putting her life in grave danger. Determined to save her, Gao confronts the hijackers head-on. Can he rescue all the passengers and thwart the crisis?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicate's mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect's Zhang Chui Shan's son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Dead Talents Society
programme.desc: Newbie ghost Rookie must fight to prove herself in the afterlife, where spirits are required to deliver spectacular scares to earn their place. Facing the threat of vanishing if she fails to secure a haunting license, she teams up with a washed-up ghost diva and her spectral agent, who train her to become the next star and stage the world's greatest fright.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Former world champion boxer Fai meets fiery young fighter Qi in Macau. As he mentors Qi for an upcoming MMA tournament, Fai rekindles his passion for fighting, life, and the people he cares about.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: After it is discovered that the drugs seized on the Chinese ships had been planted by the henchman of a notorious drug cartel leader named Naw Khar, the governments of Thailand, Laos, Myanmar and China launched a joint task force to apprehend the criminal by sending a band of elite narcotics officers to the Golden Triangle to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his father's serious illness.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Dead Talents Society
programme.desc: Newbie ghost Rookie must fight to prove herself in the afterlife, where spirits are required to deliver spectacular scares to earn their place. Facing the threat of vanishing if she fails to secure a haunting license, she teams up with a washed-up ghost diva and her spectral agent, who train her to become the next star and stage the world's greatest fright.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: YOLO
programme.desc: Feeling lost and aimless, Le Ying chooses to withdraw from society after a short working experience. After a series of unexpected events one day, she decides to embrace life anew. She sees a chance for a fresh start when she meets a boxing coach, yet the challenges ahead far exceed her expectations, marking a vibrant start to her journey.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Bodyguards And Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily's Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says yes. Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Liu's family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools' choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspect's murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Lau's investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: YOLO
programme.desc: Feeling lost and aimless, Le Ying chooses to withdraw from society after a short working experience. After a series of unexpected events one day, she decides to embrace life anew. She sees a chance for a fresh start when she meets a boxing coach, yet the challenges ahead far exceed her expectations, marking a vibrant start to her journey.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: A massive fire caused by illegal garbage smuggling has triggered a radiation crisis in Hong Kong. Government advisor Simon joins the crisis response team led by Acting Chief Executive to avert the disaster. A fire brigade is tasked to enter the radiation zone and stop the cesium fallout. Facing the unprecedented catastrophe, can they save the city?

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang's first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt's puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: My Best Bet
programme.desc: Gambling addict Jing vows to quit after marrying anti-gambling advocate Zheng. However, wealthy gambler Ian nurses a long-held grudge against Zheng over a past humiliation and exacts revenge by taking the couple's siblings hostage. To save them, Jing breaks her vow and alongside Zheng, faces Ian in a final gamble.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the Kowloon Walled City while fleeing, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom. Bonding with Shin, Twelfth Master and AV, they unite under Tornado's leadership to defend against the villain, Mr Big's assaults, and pledge to protect the safe haven of the Walled City together.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man's party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief's granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a swordsman who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonour. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas' pursuit.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao's home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife's faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them, he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kam's empire.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Long's wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo - The Real Heroes S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A superhero child and his special car, Super Speedo, go on adventiures to save the world from villains.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep67
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

As one by one the friends are stalked by a killer, they discover this has happened before, and they turn to two survivors of the legendary Southport Massacre of 1997 for help.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

They manage to escape to a supermarket, where they run into Kaoru's classmate Tsutsumi.

programme.title: Nyaight Of The Living Cat S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cats In Prison - The Japanese government is on the verge of collapse due to the nyandemic outbreak. Meanwhile, the group waiting to be rescued at the supermarket enjoys Kaoru's special nekomanma, and enjoys a brief moment of happiness. However, a cat that had somehow sneaked into the supermarket turned the people into cute cats in no time, wreaking havoc inside the store! What is the strategy to escape from the store that has become a cat hangout?

programme.title: Spy Kids: All The Time In The World
programme.desc: The action packed franchise is backwith the next generation of Spy Kids!

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: A grumpy widower forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbors that turns his world around.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival, meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: New York "date doctor" Alex Hitchens (Will Smith) tries to charm gossip columnist Sara Melas (Eva Mendes) at the same time he is coaching shy Albert (Kevin James) on how to win the love of beautiful heiress Allegra Cole (Amber Valletta).

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Robin Hood in Ridley Scott's epic reimaginingfighting corruption and sparking a rebellion that turns a humble outlaw into a timeless symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must switch identities to track down a heroin thief and save their department.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: In Wanted, a slacker is recruited by a secret assassin fraternity, uncovering hidden powers and dark truths as he trains under elite killers, including Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw team up to stop a superhuman villain with a deadly bio-weapon in this explosive Fast & Furious spin-off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba, and more.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.title: Back To The Future III
programme.desc: In Back to the Future Part III, Marty travels to 1885 to save Doc from an outlaw. Packed with laughs, action, and heart, it's the epic Wild West finale to the beloved trilogy.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and crew face a deadly new enemyDeckard Shawseeking revenge in this high-octane chapter of the Fast & Furious saga. Action explodes as the team fights to protect their own.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepareda competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her family's estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Miami detectives Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey are back in a war on the drug Ecstasy on the streets in Miami.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger reprises his career-changing role as the Terminator in this explosive film that was selected as one of AFI's Top Ten Sci-Fi films of all time.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: Two soldiers killed in Vietnam are revived years later as cyborg super-soldiers. But when memories return, they break freesetting up a brutal showdown between former comrades.

programme.title: Moby Dick Part 1
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

programme.title: Moby Dick Part 2
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

programme.title: Godzilla Minus One
programme.desc: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In Battleship, Earth battles a powerful alien force across sea, sky, and land. Directed by Peter Berg and starring Liam Neeson, Taylor Kitsch, and Rihanna, it's explosive action at sea.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in 47 Ronin, an epic fantasy where an outcast joins samurai on a quest for vengeance and honor against a ruthless overlord in ancient Japan.

programme.desc: During the 1950s a young Sir David Attenborough and a team from London Zoo worked to conserve rare and exotic animals by bringing them to the UK. Part 1/2.

programme.desc: Series 3, Episode 15 - Robson is joined by sporting legend Steve Cram on his Northumberland trip to Bamburgh.

programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 1 - Joanna's journey begins in the sub-zero temperatures of Hokkaido - Japan's wild north. Known for its rugged terrain, it is home to some of Japan's most endangered wild animals.

programme.desc: Even the mightiest oak must start life as a tiny acorn. We explore the secret lives of young trees, discovering how they magically transform from minute seeds into mature adults. But with fewer than one in a thousand seeds reaching adulthood, a tree's early years are the most treacherous of its life.

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In this second programme, Simon focuses on some of the dodgiest and most dangerous situations he has found himself in while travelling the globe.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Mississippi with Nick Knowles S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Nick learns about Civil Rights activist Medgar Evers, and paddles on the river at sunset.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Coldness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the Frozen Wilds of Manitoba, North Canada, and visits a town that sometimes has more polar bears than people.

programme.title: Solar System S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Worlds - Professor Brian Cox explores the solar system's hidden realms, between and beyond the planets, where countless worlds lie hiding in the darkness.

programme.title: Frozen Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Summer - In Summer, there is 24 hour daylight in the Poles. The land becomes green and productive, and there is an abundance of food for the baby animals.

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Four rival families - leopards, hyena, wild dogs and lions - all try to claim a rich corner of Zambian paradise as their home. Who will succeed in ruling this precious kingdom?

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Leopard Mutima's relationship with her mother is at breaking point, and as the balance of power in Nsefu tips towards the lions, the hyenas and wild dogs fight to raise their young.

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Leopard Olimba finds a mate, but fortunes turn against the lions. Extreme flooding leads to disaster for the hyena clan, and the time has come for leopard Mutima to leave.

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Injured wild dog Flint helps care for Storm's largest ever litter of pups. Leopard Mutima searches for a home, and the lions are challenged by forces beyond their control.

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The final chapter. Olimba struggles with old age, and the wild dog story takes an unexpected turn. The lions and the hyenas both enjoy a baby boom - but who has the power to rule?

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Meet the people that made filming Kingdom possible and uncover the extraordinary acts of conservationists and anti-poaching teams protecting South Luangwa and all its inhabitants.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Michael B. Jordan - Actor Michael B. Jordan joins Grylls in Wales where they start their journey by dropping into rough waters off the coast before making their way up the coast and to the top of the mountains for their exit.

programme.title: Secrets of the Jurassic Dinosaurs S1 Ep1
programme.desc: An international team of palaeontologists in the remote badlands of Wyoming investigate a mysterious dinosaur graveyard. Packed with over a dozen skeletons including predators such as the fearsome Allosaurus and iconic giants like Diplodocus, as well as fossilised plants and footprints.

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In this third episode, Simon focuses on some of the incredible wildlife stories he's encountered.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Michael B. Jordan - Actor Michael B. Jordan joins Grylls in Wales where they start their journey by dropping into rough waters off the coast before making their way up the coast and to the top of the mountains for their exit.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Love in the Air - Check in with animals who are winners at the aerial mating game. Take flight with a bee crafting a custom love potion, watch a draco lizard soar to fend off rivals, and witness the graceful pas de deux that bonds a pair of Japanese cranes for life.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Flight Path - Plot a course for adventure as animals go on remarkable journeys through the skies. Navigate a wooden labyrinth with a speedy goshawk, join a sandgrouse's trek to a distant watering hole, and see a murmuration of starlings mesmerize their nemesis.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rivers - Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lion Daycare - Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Shark Dentist - Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkey's nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep5
programme.desc: A Pangolin's Plight - Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda's team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center's baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Winged Weirdos - One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lion Daycare - Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years' worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth's oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocodile Capers - Strap in for Dr. Amanda's risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who's headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lion Daycare - Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Shark Dentist - Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkey's nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lakes - Journey through mystical lakes, where life adapts, survives, and transforms. Witness the power of ancient beasts like the snapping turtle, watch a dragonfly metamorphosis, and walk tall with flamingoes as they brave burning, corrosive waters.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years' worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth's oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocodile Capers - Strap in for Dr. Amanda's risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who's headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ugly - Gawk at some of the world's ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they're evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep1

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planet's most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Crowded Seas - Dip into North America's southern coastal waters, where opalescent squid mate, sea turtles nest, and mobula rays take flight for the sake of romance. Fly a specialized drone with Lizzie as she swoops in for a breath sample from a blue whale.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Coral Seas - Marvel at North America's natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, digs for ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Prowl with jaguars that stalk a Costa Rican beach and meet the planet's biggest sharks.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It's spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 4 - Cornwall has more than its fair share of folktales. Perhaps the most famous is found near Land's End, where Rick recounts the tale of the Mermaid of Zennor. A short distance away, Rick joins a small army of seaweed harvesters who are feeding an increasing appetite for a natural food more common in Japan.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Christmas Chocolat - Rachel visits Stockholm to learn tips from an award-winning chocolatier. Then she makes venison ragu and other dishes that are perfect for a celebration.

programme.desc: Chef Guillaume Brahimi completes his tour of Paris with an exploration of the bohemian hub of the city, including a degustation of Parisian beer, and the intriguing neighbourhood of Edith Piaf.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 5 - Following in the footsteps of one of his literary heroes, Rick roams the dramatic north Cornish coast to tell the story of one of Britain's best-loved writers, Thomas Hardy. Another famous writer, Dylan Thomas, dubbed Rick's next stop, Mousehole, as 'the loveliest village in Britain'. It's here that Rick discovers the origins of the iconic Cornish dish stargazy pie.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gallipoli - Gino is in the city of Gallipoli. He joins a diver on her small boat as they head to the sea caves. She forages for red oysters which they eat with a glass of rose. Gino heads into town and tries out Scapece, a dish of fish in saffron and of religious significance in the city. Inspired by the the saffron and fresh fish, Gino demonstrates the Puglian classic Tiella, the Italian answer to paella, made with mussels, rice and potatoes.

programme.title: Billionaire Resorts S1 Ep3

programme.desc: The All You Eat Buffet takes a luxury turn. It's a brave new world of $10,000 sides of wagyu beef, foie-gras mac n cheese, Alaska king crab claws piled high and 20,000 gold leaf topped crme brles.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: Christmas Specials: 2023 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great New Year Bake Off - Familiar faces from Bake Off past - Maxy, Jrgen, Maggie and Mark - battle it out to win the first Star Baker of 2024, before seeing the New Year in with a performance from Bone-Afide.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S33 Ep12
