programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover - When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Make A Movie! - When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Pete The Polar Bear - Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat's sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don't go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it's even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabby's imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis,Bug The Pug,after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HR's constant paperwork.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp,he's forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However,Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee's Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Cave New World - When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Thunk Tank - When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Home Punch Home - Tired of the farm's feud with the neighboring punch monkeys, Ugga arranges a punch summit where the Bettermans and Croods will stay in the punch monkey village to learn how to all get along.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Featherhide - Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young cloaking dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fault Ripper - Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it's revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful,but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin's jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedian's disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp,but to get the interview,he'll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle's super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis,Bug The Pug,after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HR's constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they're so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Uncharted Territory - Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Journey to the Snowcano - Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip's Music Store!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover - When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Make A Movie! - When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Pete The Polar Bear - Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat's sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don't go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Picktools - When the crew gets stuck on a sheet of thin ice, they run into a group of Picktools, which appear to be trying to crack the ice around them.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep16
programme.desc: It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Two's Company - Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep23
programme.desc: CatRat The Bandit - The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep63
programme.desc: Untitled Templeton Project - Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town's faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep64
programme.desc: Puppy Love - Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep65
programme.desc: Biscuits Rising - Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who's been hired to wreck Boss and Tina's lives. Crispin puts the new company's loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep66
programme.desc: Moon Shot - Our team's startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina's startup company for exploding baby Iggy's favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp's current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Goodbye Crood World - When Phil detects a meteor is hurtling towards the farm, the Bettermans and Croods must decide how to spend their last day on earth.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sticky Business - Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil's perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Guy Time - When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D'Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Downpour - Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp,he's forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However,Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee's Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Decoy - Tom's leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 1 - Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder's home realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Postmortem - Tensions run high within team Voltron as they discuss Lotor's fate and try to figure out their next move

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Wrestlebabia: The Musica , Flowers For Munk - When Sandy can't join animal wrestling she poses as Mandy Monkhuahua, In order to help Munk, Grug sticks super worms up his nose that make him smarter

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Lucky and the Jam Jam - The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool's Day fever

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Bridge - A group of Trux displaced by a volcano comes to Ty for help, and the gang has to work together to build a bridge to welcome their new guests.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Lots Of Raa's In The Jungle - Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc until Zebby wonders what zebras do together the animals discover that zebras stampede which is great fun and very noisy!

programme.title: Jj's Animal Time S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Sing Along WIth the Animals - Sing along with the animals! Learn about colors with a family of sharks, showcase your talents at a talent show & play a game of "Duck, Duck, Goose."

programme.title: Little Angel S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Playtime - It's time to play! Baby John is having a fun-filled day at the playground, where he learns how to share, take turns, & make new friends.

programme.title: Little Angel S8 Ep9
programme.desc: The Best Memories We Made This Year - Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders S3 Ep2
programme.desc: It's a Wonderful World - From the secrets of the Ancient Pyramids to the way our brains work, Blippi Wonders explores what makes our world so wonderful.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Love Our Planet - Love our planet with Blippi! He learns about recycling in the Earth Day song, builds a playground & discovers how a boulder becomes a grain of sand.

programme.title: ARPO S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Tick Tock Bot - Arpo's day is full of wild inventions & crazy gadgets, from a multiplying ray to a runaway drone, leading to hilarious, unintended consequences.

programme.title: ARPO S3 Ep2
programme.desc: ARPO Has a Crazy Day - Arpo's day is a whirlwind of crazy challenges, from runaway ice cream trucks to mischievous baby antics.

programme.title: Cece Time S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Playtime On the Farm With CeCe - It's playtime on the farm with CeCe! She connects with farm animals, pretends to be Little Bo Peep & rounds up her classmates as Farmer Cece.

programme.title: CoComelon S5 Ep27
programme.desc: A Year of Family Celebrations! - It's song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating life's big moments for little kids.

programme.title: CoComelon S5 Ep28
programme.desc: Our Favorite Celebrations of the Year! - It's song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating life's big moments for little kids.

programme.title: Morphle S2 Ep1
programme.desc: My Big Red Bus And Shrinking Town - Morphle becomes a big red bus for a fun city tour, but the trip takes a weird turn when they discover a town that has been mysteriously shrunk.

programme.title: Morphle S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Cranky Babies - A wave of chaos is making all the babies in Petport cranky! Mila & Morphle must restore order by stopping a runaway pizza monster & a giant robot.

programme.title: Rob The Robot S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Splish Splash - The crew finds a friend for a lonely fish on the Ocean Planet & then learns the importance of including everyone during playtime.

programme.title: Rob The Robot S2 Ep2
programme.desc: TKs Toy - It's all about TK's toy teddy bear! She wants to throw it away, but on the Junk Planet, the crew learns about recycling & fixing old things.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum S11 Ep2
programme.desc: Sing Along To Your Favourites - Let's sing along to your favorites! Max gets his first bath, Mia & Max play peek-a-boo & the friends learn all about shapes on a train ride.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum S13 Ep3
programme.desc: Get Ready to Sing Along - Get ready to sing along! Miss Polly's dolly is sick, the family goes on a sleepy bus ride & the friends make their own instruments.

programme.title: Go Buster S6 Ep9
programme.desc: What a Year!: Our Biggest Adventures! - Join the cute and cheeky Buster, as he rides into adventures both big and small with his friends!

programme.title: Go Buster S6 Ep8
programme.desc: A Reflection on Our Favorite Year! - Join the cute and cheeky Buster, as he rides into adventures both big and small with his friends!

programme.title: Gecko's Garage S6 Ep1
programme.desc: Basketball Boo Boo - It's a day of boo boos! Max gets hurt playing basketball, Gecko gets injured & a friend needs rescuing during a game of hide-and-seek.

programme.title: Gecko's Garage S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Bus Mayhem - It's Baby Bus Mayhem! Baby Truck & Molly learn to share, a magic show goes wrong & Weasel cheats in a football match.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Farming Sing Along - It's a farming sing-along! Learn your ABCs, do the five senses shakedown & go stargazing with Grandma Mei.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Singing Fun! - It's time for singing fun! Learn your ABCs, wash your hands before you eat & get ready for a sleepover at Grandma Mei's house.

programme.title: Minibods S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Pumpkin Munch Mayhem - It's pumpkin munch mayhem! A hungry Wrigglepillar wants to eat Newt's giant pumpkin & Bubbles cheats in a football game.

programme.title: Minibods S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pedal Power - It's time for some pedal power! Newt & her friends go on a bike adventure, Pogo learns to be patient & Jeff gets a messy houseguest.

programme.title: CoComelon S5 Ep27
programme.desc: A Year of Family Celebrations! - It's song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating life's big moments for little kids.

programme.title: Cece Time S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Playtime On the Farm With CeCe - It's playtime on the farm with CeCe! She connects with farm animals, pretends to be Little Bo Peep & rounds up her classmates as Farmer Cece.

programme.title: CoComelon S5 Ep29
programme.desc: A Look Back at Our Biggest Milestones! - It's song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating life's big moments for little kids.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle S1 Ep1

programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep218
programme.desc: The Crew Raises A Runway/ The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard - When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash - Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1114
programme.desc: A Jr. Patroller's Christmas - At a Christmas Eve sleepover the Jr. Patrollers are fooled into helping Mayor Humdinger steal everyone's stockings so he can get all the presents.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1021
programme.desc: Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan / Pups Save A Turbot Tournament - Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II - Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Invasion - Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Turtle House / The Crew Builds A Giant Volcano - It's Friend Appreciation Day! But when Speed Meister's gift for Mr. McTurtle goes awry, he has to call Rubble & Crew for help.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Squeak - There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Dora's Mermaid Adventure / Mermazing Surprise - Dora and Boots become mermaids and help Marisol the Mermaid save her home, Sirena Sea! Dora and Boots go across the sea to help their dolphin friend find the best gift ever, a magic jewel!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep812
programme.desc: Get the Letters to Santa! - When Axle City's letters to Santa go undelivered, Blaze and Sparkle set out on an epic adventure to the North Pole to deliver them themselves! But can they make it to Santa before Christmas?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Treasure / Roar / Mammoth - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure. It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town. Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep825
programme.desc: Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel / Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat - Marshall and Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel. Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep312
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Tunnel - Park Ranger Rose and Rubble & Crew discover a meteorite outside of Builder Cove! But when Speed Meister and Mega Meister try to take it, the pups need their giant construction vehicles.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep313
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mega Stunt Ramp - Rubble & Crew use their giant trucks to make awesome stunt ramps when Speed Meister challenges Mayor Greatway to a stunt competition.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep709
programme.desc: Renewable Energy Racers - Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire - The twins visit Barbabright's room. If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Invasion / Prank Day - Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their siblings' teasings.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Toy / Astrofools / Mole - Tim does all he can to get the new DinoStar toy. It's a day for practical jokes, but Tim doesn't know when to stop. Tim and Dad have to catch a troublesome mole.

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Dora's Mermaid Adventure / Mermazing Surprise - Dora and Boots become mermaids and help Marisol the Mermaid save her home, Sirena Sea! Dora and Boots go across the sea to help their dolphin friend find the best gift ever, a magic jewel!

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Mascota Mobile / Kite Festival - Dora is about to give her pets a bath when the pet-washing truck goes haywire, and she has to save pets throughout the rainforest!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep315
programme.desc: The William Manta Show / The Musical Mystery - William hosts his very own TV show. Chucks and Ezra set out to find a special song.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep66
programme.desc: Not Enough Room - The Teletubbies are about to go on the Tubby Custard Ride with the hat, bag, ball and scooter when they realise there is not enough room. The Noo-Noo looks after their things.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep6
programme.desc: F - Dee encourages a friend to say 'f', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We make some funny faces, see some fish and follow a fast fire engine!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Fairy Tale Trail - Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt. But when Zip becomes unsure about the clues, will the friends still get their magical fairy tale prize?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Messy Migration - When a little turtle gets stranded on the beach in OKIDO, Messy helps her rejoin her friends so they can begin their journey across the ocean.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Chest - Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep11
programme.desc: The Cheerleading Badge - The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep27
programme.desc: The Stokkur Geyser, Iceland - The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Spy Game - When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Army - Jack is the new dog at school and the newest recruit in Rusty's Army. Jack struggles with following instructions and always forgets his hat, but Rusty will make a soldier of him yet.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Kangaroos - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to Australia on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of why a group of kangaroos, and their joeys, are living on a beach. Along the way, Andy is chased by a pack of dingoes and hops to safety with the baby kangaroos.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mission: Party Time - Disability assistance dog Tinks is determined to help her owner Charli feel confident enough to go to a party.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon and Giant Otter - Steve and Aneeshwar drive through the baboons' enclosure and say hello to some very mischievous residents. They then meet the giant river otters at feeding time.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Peas - Bella and Lift visit the Fortress of Fun, where Kingsley and Queenie have fun looking for peas with the Playtimers in their Pea Party game.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and pal Rodeo Horse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Symbiosis Shrink Down - The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Mission Manatee, USA - The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep2
programme.desc: Thomas' Fuzzy Friend - When Thomas discovers a missing dog rummaging around the railway yard, he tries to find the dog a new home.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Plate Escape - Sarah, Duck and Plate Girl find some unusual inhabitants in the Plant Section at the shop.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Paisley Sea - The duo think they are heading to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House - Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Museum - Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep43
programme.desc: It's time for a special visitor - It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mini Bluey - When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Loch Ness, Scotland - The Go Jetters head to Scotland in search of the Loch Ness Monster, but Grandmaster Glitch plans to catch Nessie first, if only his Grimbler was up to the job.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Runner Beans - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's the speedy dancing runner beans!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Pak Choi - Pak Choi, who might be known by many names, sings about how she's "Always Pak To You!"

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Operation Kiwi - Supertato, Carrot and Tomato are exploring in the plant aisle when they hear a strange noise. They follow the noise and meet the famous Kiwi the Explorer, who needs their help.

programme.desc: Messy Migration - When a little turtle gets stranded on the beach in OKIDO, Messy helps her rejoin her friends so they can begin their journey across the ocean.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Chest - Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep11
programme.desc: The Cheerleading Badge - The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep27
programme.desc: The Stokkur Geyser, Iceland - The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Spy Game - When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Army - Jack is the new dog at school and the newest recruit in Rusty's Army. Jack struggles with following instructions and always forgets his hat, but Rusty will make a soldier of him yet.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Kangaroos - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to Australia on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of why a group of kangaroos, and their joeys, are living on a beach. Along the way, Andy is chased by a pack of dingoes and hops to safety with the baby kangaroos.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mission: Party Time - Disability assistance dog Tinks is determined to help her owner Charli feel confident enough to go to a party.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon and Giant Otter - Steve and Aneeshwar drive through the baboons' enclosure and say hello to some very mischievous residents. They then meet the giant river otters at feeding time.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Peas - Bella and Lift visit the Fortress of Fun, where Kingsley and Queenie have fun looking for peas with the Playtimers in their Pea Party game.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and pal Rodeo Horse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.desc: Crossing a Glacier With 1,400 Sheep - Shepherds have been crossing the Alps with their animals for 6,000 years. That means climbing 3,000 meters in altitude, all while crossing rivers and a glacier. Called "transhumance, the seasonal movement of livestock is now world cultural heritage.

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: Using AI and robots in the service of religion - Even world religions have to keep up with digital progress. Examples include androids that hold church services, AI models taking confession, robots assisting with rituals and apps to guide your prayers.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Asia 2050. Indias's Carbon Neutral Villages 2050 - India's villages can play a key role in the fight against climate change. Will the slow progress and limited resources of villages hinder hitting the carbon neutral goal, or will new technologies help them succeed?

programme.title: Dont hold back
programme.desc: Cultural beliefs around weight loss and weight gain - Kopano - What does "healthy really mean in 2025? In this episode of Dont Hold Back, host Nozibele Qamngana-Mayaba sits down with fitness coach Kopano Mokhele, who deliberately gained 25 kilos and is now losing it again so that he can understand what his clients go through. Together, they unpack the myths and realities of health in an age of body image pressure and quick-fix diets.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.desc: Mongolia - Valley of the Bears - Part 2 - For decades, Mongolia's biodiversity has been decimated by hunting and resource extraction. Today, rangers are trying to persuade the population to rethink. But the appearance of bears in the villages could undo these efforts.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Global Us
programme.desc: Unseen: Malaysia - Malaysian food show host Nazrudin Rahman thinks a lot about what his family eats. He sets off on a journey to learn more about an almost invisible problem: tiny plastic particles in his lunch and dinner. He discovers that the problem is closely connected to waste disposal and doesnt just involve food. Hed better kick out some of the products in his bathroom as well.

How can she escape that pressure?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM SPECIAL EDITION S1 Ep3025
programme.desc: A Recipe for Succession: From finding business successors to preserving prized recipes, this episode focuses on ensuring the survival of companies and products that are at risk of disappearing.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords S1 Ep6059
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, a sword made by Kuniyuki that is imbued with the power of the deity Fudo-myo-o.

programme.title: Hometown Stories S1 Ep5003
programme.desc: Painter Yoshinari Ishimura has autism. His late mother sparked his love of animals, which now inspires his work. With his father's help, Yoshinari is expanding his world and bringing joy to others.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Fall #9 S1 Ep6051
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: Journeys in Japan S1 Ep2007
programme.desc: Kyle Card finds a tranquil townscape with a retro feel by the Uchikawa River in Toyama Pref. On this program, get to know the real Japan and discover useful travel tips.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: My Street Piano S1 Ep6303
programme.desc: On a shopping street in front of Kagoshima Chuo Station sits Japan' s original street piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

programme.title: Dining With the Chef S1 Ep2019
programme.desc: Join Harry Sugiyama and chef Hayashi for a fresh, fast master class in ultra-simple Japanese cooking, where shrimp and eggs take the spotlight. Let's get cooking!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan S1 Ep6126
programme.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar S1 Ep6124
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the autumn dates of kanro and soko. The nuns show us how to make the seasonal specialties gammodoki and gohei-mochi rice cakes.

programme.title: Document 72 hours S1 Ep4026
programme.desc: A public library in Kanazawa resembles a sublime theater and offers more than 1.1 million books. For three days, we asked people what books piqued their interest and how they spend their time here.

programme.title: 1/45: Gambling Addiction S1 Ep6065
programme.desc: 1 in 45 Japanese are suspected of a gambling addiction. We follow a man who made a clean break from gambling, overcoming the crisis of a broken family, and is in the recovery process from addiction.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers S1 Ep2050
programme.desc: A large-scale study in Japan has shown that improving one's diet and lifestyle can slow the progression of chronic kidney disease. Clinical trials in regenerative medicine are also underway.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC316DevalishvilivsOMalley2
programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines the Octagons return to the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey for UFC 316 on June 7. In the main event, its a highly anticipated rematch when relentless force Merab Dvalishvili defends his bantamweight crown against the man he took it from, Suga Sean OMalley. Plus, the womens bantamweight title is on the line in the co-main event as Julianna Pea faces off with two-time Olympic gold medal winning judoka Kayla Harrison. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
